# repeatMode

**Instance Property**

An option that determines how the animation repeats.

## Declaration

```swift
var repeatMode: AnimationRepeatMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you call [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AnimationDefinition/trimmed(start:end:duration:)] with a `start` or `end` that lies outside of the timeline defined by [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AnimationDefinition/duration], the animation fills the additional playback by applying this property.

## Repeating animation playback

- **fillMode**: An option that determines which data displays outside of the normal duration.
- **repeated(count:)**: Repeats an animation the number of times specified by an irrational number.
- **repeated(count:)**: Repeats an animation the number of times specified by a whole number.
- **repeatingForever()**: Repeats the animation infinitely.
